storyInfo: Helena hitches a ride to the frontier office. Someone is in a rush, while someone else wants her to slow down.

attributes.content: Wooâ€”
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Been a while since I've had a ride like that!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: That's one damn fine car you've got, Jessica. Why don't you take it out more often?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Guess I picked the right ride, though we'll have to split up once we're at the frontier office. How about you let me drive back to the camp, before you go off on your solo mission?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Hey, what's this red indicator light? And why are you so pale?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Three...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Third gear? No, that's too slow.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Two... One...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Helena...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I see it. Over there. The drivechain is broken.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Bridge the connection. A few turns of the spanner. Shouldn't take more than a minute or two.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: C'mon, no need for the long face. I know your mission's urgent, but it ain't like I've been slowing you down.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: We wouldn't even be halfway there if we followed the speed limit from that manual of yours.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: The recommended speed was derived from various factors such as road conditions and weather... It's there for a reason.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You gonna let a machine like this run slower than a metal crab? You could fix this beaut a dozen times over in the time that I saved you.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Fix it? Me?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You know what they say out in the barrens: Don't ask what's in someone else's pocket, and don't reach under someone else's car hood.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Anyway, I've taught you all my tricks. Our new sheriff can't very well have someone else fix her car for her every last time, can she?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: But you're the one whoâ€”
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Alright, less yapping and more fixing. You're in a hurry, right? This ain't no place to dawdle. I'll buy you a pint from that saloon next to the office.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: N-No, I can't drink. I still have a mission to do.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Now, I know what you're thinking, but their stuff ain't like the swill we brew back at camp. It wonâ€™t knock you out with just a sip, like last time.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I-I have no idea what you're talking about.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Oh dear, all these parts are loose now. We were really going too fast...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What's that? You think that was fast? Let's see if we can't go faster.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Oh! Helena, er, go and get some rest. I'm just fetching some parts from the trunk.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That's more like it. A sheriff's got to know how to fix her own car.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: What's with all those spare parts in the trunk? No wonder the center of gravity felt off.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: But these are only the bare minimum required by the safety manual. I don't even have a set of tire repair tools. I hope we don't pop one on the way...
attributes.name: Jessica
Helena
attributes.content: Man, you've gotten so damn stiff ever since Woody gave you that badge.

attributes.name: Helena
attributes.content: Fine, you do you. I'm gonna find some shade and enjoy the view. Gimme a holler when you're done.
â™ªShe rides into the wilds, sunsets taken in towâ™ª
attributes.name: Faint Echo

attributes.content: â™ªToo sneaky for the wind, the shadows are too slowâ™ª
attributes.name: Faint Echo

attributes.content: â™ªNever, never stopping, never setting foot at homeâ™ª
attributes.name: Faint Echo

attributes.content: Turn off the engines.
attributes.name: Scarred Pioneer

attributes.content: Is it really her? She dares show her face here, after all these years?
attributes.name: Flustered Pioneer

attributes.content: Shut up! I'm listening.
attributes.name: Scarred Pioneer

attributes.content: Yeah, it's her all right.
attributes.name: Scarred Pioneer

attributes.content: Stay still! Did you forget?
attributes.name: Scarred Pioneer

attributes.content: Wipe the lenses on those binoculars. Take a good long look and see where she's hiding.
attributes.name: Scarred Pioneer

attributes.content: I see her. The next corner. She's not alone. There's someone under... Did their car break down or something?
attributes.name: Flustered Pioneer

attributes.content: If we're doing this, we take out the one under the car first.
attributes.name: Scarred Pioneer

attributes.content: So what now? Do we just wait?
attributes.name: Flustered Pioneer

attributes.content: Wait. But keep your knife and crossbow out.
attributes.name: Scarred Pioneer

attributes.content: â™ªNever, never stopping, never setting foot at homeâ™ª
attributes.name: Helena
Helena
attributes.content: Ah, my throat's getting dry.

attributes.name: Helena
attributes.content: You done yet? It's getting late.
Almost, almost.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Sure you don't need any help?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Almost there. Just need to reinforce the welding...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Say, Helena... mind if I took the wheel? Don't worry, I don't have any violations on my license.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No way. I get carsick if we go too slow.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Plus, I'm just hitching a ride, not going on your mission with you. You can drive however you want after we make it to the office.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Alright, give me another minute. I've got to check this again...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Can't you hurry it up a little? What happened to all that energy you had back at the camp?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Well, I guess I'll just keep enjoying the sunset. I think I'd get a better view from on top of this rock.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Cliff faces in the wilderness, changing color every second with the afterglow. Never get bored of it.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Hm? What's that?
attributes.name: Helena
Jessica
attributes.content: Alright, done. We can go now.

attributes.name: Jessica
attributes.content: Helena?
What's going on?!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I smell something dirty in the wind.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Won't take the hint from the warning shot, but not brave enough to come down from the cliffs?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: A-A fight? I'll get my gun from under the seat...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: One sec, Jessica... no need.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Helena narrows her eyes and sweeps her gaze across the setting sun, the faintly purple shadows beneath the cliffs, and finally onto the girl whose sleeves are blackened with oil and grime.
There is a hint of nervousness in the girl's eyes, but underneath it her gaze is as firm as the badge on her chest.
Your mission's more important. No need to waste your time on these blood bags.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: You fixed the car yet?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Yeah, we can go now.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Then let's go.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Not in the passenger seat, egghead. How am I supposed to turn the wheel while aiming? You take the key.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Me? But...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: But drive fast this time, seriously.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: There are people coming down from the cliffs behind us! Looks like their cars have been modified too.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Not half as good-looking as yours, though.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: And they ain't half as good drivers, either, if they gotta slow down on such a gentle slope. Just keep the pedal to the metal and leave them to me.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Do you know them?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Nah, made too many enemies to remember who's who. Not much of difference, though. It's usually the other side that picked the fight.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Keep your head down!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Why's this thing going so slow?!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I added a speed limiter!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I-I was afraid you'd be speeding again, so I added a speed limiter! It can't exceed the recommended speed limit now.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Helena pokes her upper body out of the window and points her nail gun at the dust cloud in the rear. The spiked vehicles that emerge from the dust cloud are promptly met by loud bangs from her hand.
Deadly metal streaks through the wind and sand until her magazine runs empty. The pursuers' numbers are greatly thinned by the time the sound of explosions is scattered by the wind.
You just...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Scum like these don't let go once they think they've got their mark. Keep your foot on the pedal and go as fast as you can! Don't give me that speed limit crap!
attributes.name: Helena
Jessica
attributes.content: O-Okay!

attributes.name: Jessica
attributes.content: But this isn't safe at all!
You're still changing gears? What do you think this is, some kinda parade?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: They're catching up! The speed... what do I do? What do I do?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Open the trunk!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Wh-What?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Toss out all that junk you're carrying!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: All of it, now!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Hurry! Trust me!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: The car trunk flies wide open, and several massive metal toolboxes spill onto the ground, bouncing and rolling into the dust cloud.
The warped and battered locks can no longer contain their contents, so screws, rods and spanners, shiny and chrome, burst out from the boxes, forming a rain of iron.
This is followed by the joyous sounds of metal on metal, tires screeching to a halt on the gravel, and panicked cries and cursing.
Sounds like it worked!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Still not enough! Toss out everything you can and smash their cars! I'll do it!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: What's this?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: A safety manual that I printed out at HQ to bring back toâ€”
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You printed it? And it takes up a whole box? Out it goes!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: And this shield...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: NOT THAT!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I know, I know! We've still got a few seats...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Dammit, the backseats are screwed to the floor! Toss a wrench!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: You threw them all out!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Let's try this!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: With one hand on the wheel, Jessica draws her pistol, turns around, and fires at the thick and heavy screw.
Bang! A hole appears on the chassis, sending both the screw and backseats into the wilderness yonder.
Say something first next time, okay? I nearly went deaf.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Sorry, I was in a hurry...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Shooting a gun in the car ain't exactly following the safety regulations, is it? But hey, nice shot...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: ...You did avoid hitting any important parts of the frame, right?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Jessica says nothing and casts a resigned look at Helena. It does not take long for her to understand why.
The whole vehicle begins to shake. Scrap begins to fly out from every gap and corner, all to the screeching sound of metal grinding against metal.
You should reload while you can... I don't know how long this thing's gonna last.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Hey, is it just me, or are we going faster?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: We shouldn't be speeding up this much, even if we've shed quite a bit of weight... What about the limiter? Did you toss that, too?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica nods her head, then shakes it.
Helena turns around. The first thing she sees is Jessica's brow. The drops of sweat on it appeared out of nowhere in an instant.
The next thing she sees is the pointer needle on the instrument board, stuck and trembling at the rightmost side of the gauge. Also trembling are Jessica's hands on the wheel.
...Jessica?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: ...The accelerator pedal's stuck. And the brakes aren't working.
attributes.name: Jessica
Jessica
attributes.content: I think that shot might have, you know, grazed the brake wires... or maybe cut them in half...

attributes.name: Jessica
attributes.content: Whoa!
For an instant, Helena's expression is frozen on her face. Then she starts to feel like she has never seen anything so funny in her life.
Haha... hahaha! This is FUN!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Enjoy the ride, kiddo! Forget safe driving! Forget navigation!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Huh? Forget...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Show some spirit, girlie! Let's lose these blood bags and forget they ever existed!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: They can't catch us anymore!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: They can't even see our taillights!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: We don't HAVE any taillights left! But the point stands!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Good job! Now remember this feeling! The thrill! The excitement!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Woody could never teach you this. This moment belongs to you! Like the wind, like the setting sun!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I... I feel it!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No one can tell you where to go! You're the one with the wheel in your hands!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: The future is the road in front of your eyes!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: ...My future is a cliff?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: No time! Jump!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Hey, wake up! Do you want my business or not?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Ugh... who's making all that noise?
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: Oh, Helena! You're early today. Why are you covered in dirt?
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: We got chased by a bunch of thugs and almost went out in a blaze of glory. How about you break out some 20-year vintage to celebrate my survival?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: You know what I have. You can help yourself to last month's vintage at the bar.
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: Haven't seen YOU before, girl. Let's have a little chat.
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: Hello... just a glass of water, please.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: WATER? This here is an establishment for adults! If you're not with Helena...
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: S-Sorry!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: C'mon, don't tease her. It's thanks to her that I'm still alive right now.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Hey, where's the ice? How am I supposed to drink this without any ice?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: The ice machine's been broken for a week. You'd know if you stopped by more often.
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: I've been all over the place this week. My legs are so tired I can hardly move. Cut me some slack here.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: How about this? You give me the burdenbeast you have tied up at your door, and I'll fix your ice machine.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: No thank you, you're not taking Nux.
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: Oh no! Look at the time... We need to go to the office now, Helena!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Don't worry, I know what I'm doing. Let me have a drink first.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Now isn't the time!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It's always the time to drink. Ain't that right, barkeep?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Always the time for those who want to drink, and never the time for those who don't.
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: This one's on me, Jessica. Drink it, or not. I did say I'd buy you a pint.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: The frontier office is twenty minutes to the north on foot. You'll even have time to wash your face.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: What about you, Helena? Aren't you coming? Those bandits...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. This saloon's safe. Those bandits can't get in.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: That's right. Wind gets in, rain gets in, but not bandit scum.
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: I was just hitching a ride anyway. Well, your car's in a better place now. You go your way, do your mission, and I'll head back to camp once I've had a drink.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Plus, those bandits won't give up so easily. You'll really be late if you stay with me and get caught up in this again.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Ha, Helena can take care of those idiots herself. Probably easier on her own anyway.
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: But... but I won't be a burden. I'm the sheriff of the camp. It's my job to deal with bandits.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Who said you were a burden? It's just, I've been going solo in the wilderness for longer than you've been alive. I haven't felt so young in a long time...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: And I'd feel guilty if I made you late. Go do what you gotta do. This is my problem; I'll deal with it.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Don't tell me you think I can't handle those thugs?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I get what you're saying, really.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: But I'd feel guilty if I didn't do anything.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Why? Being the sheriff doesn't mean that's all you do, every day.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Duty, trust, protect... Do you think Woody only ever talks about that stuff all day?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Helena, I...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Well, I guess he doesn't talk much to begin with. Back to the point. How did you feel when you threw everything to the wind and put your foot on the pedal all the way down?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: You can and should make choices that lie outside the rules.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: You're young. Whatever you do, do it because you want to, not because someone else made you. Myself included.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Oh, how good it must be to be young... Hey, barkeep! You sure you don't want me to fix your ice machine? This swill's undrinkable without ice.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Absolutely not. I'm not the one who has to drink it.
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: Why do I have to beg you to let me help you? Since when were you so cold and distant?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I could try fixing the machine. I think I have enough time. As... a token of gratitude for letting us stay.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You're in luck. She's nearly as good as I am.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Sure. Come with me.
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: Time to clean up.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: ...There. Don't hit it too hard, and it should last quite a while.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Where'd you learn to do that? And with old newspapers and broken glass? Helena, guess what... Helena?
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: She put the money under the cup... didn't touch the contents at all. Is it really that bad?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: *Cough* Argh! My throat! It burns!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: She doesn't ever slow down, does she? Wait, this is way more than the price for two glasses...
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: She's never tipped so much before. Wait a second...
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: Oh no! Nux!
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: Helena! I'm charging you double from now on if Nux gets so much as a scratch on him, you hear me? DOUBLE!
attributes.name: Saloon Keeper

attributes.content: Jessica and the barkeep run outside to see a figure riding into the sunset on the burdenbeast.
Their mixed expressions gradually grow mellow in the afterglow. The wind carries whistling and song, fading away in the distance.

attributes.text: â™ªShe rides into the wilds, sunsets taken in towâ™ª
â™ªToo sneaky for the wind, the shadows are too slowâ™ª
â™ªNever, never stopping, never setting foot at homeâ™ª
â™ªOnly lead and spirits keep her warmâ™ª
â™ªOnly lead and spirits keep her warmâ™ª

attributes.content: You found her yet?
attributes.name: Scarred Pioneer

attributes.content: No, the tire tracks disappeared just before the cliff. Any footprints have been wiped away.
attributes.name: Flustered Pioneer

attributes.content: Dagnabbit! She better not show her face ever again.
attributes.name: Scarred Pioneer

attributes.content: We just gonna let her go?
attributes.name: Flustered Pioneer

attributes.content: We got a choice? You think you could catch her? Has anyone, ever?
attributes.name: Scarred Pioneer

attributes.content: Wait! That way! I see her through the binoculars!
attributes.name: Flustered Pioneer

attributes.content: How many with her?
attributes.name: Scarred Pioneer

attributes.content: Just her, on a burdenbeast. But...
attributes.name: Flustered Pioneer

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Scarred Pioneer

attributes.content: ...She just gestured towards me.
attributes.name: Flustered Pioneer

attributes.content: ...I think it's her who found us, boss.
attributes.name: Flustered Pioneer

attributes.content: Run. And good luck... you'll need it.
attributes.name: Helena
